Nice game but cheaters and servers should be fixed.

Playing this game is like staying in an abusive relationship:
-You're not entirely sure what the pros are off the top of your head
-You get pissed off more than not
-They keep you coming back for more despite heartache and pain
-You are belittled for showing any signs of humanity or authenticity

10/10 
Will continue to pour countless hours into the franchise I've held dear for near half a decade now
Approaching 3000 hours, hands down the best fps ever made.  Competitive makes you use your big brain.
